name: Sokogeon
description:
Help the heroes to scape from the Dungeon in this #lowres puzzle adventure.

KEYS: Arrows move, X switches heros, R resets the current level, and Z rewinds time!

This is my second entry for the #1GAM and it's inspired by classics like: Sokoban or Gauntlet. If you like this, you can follow me on Twitter @VolcanoBytes and take a look at my other projects.

SOKOGEON was made in PuzzleScript during February 2017

If you want to help me develop this and more games, scroll down and click "Download now" You'll get a ZIP file containing a full screen desktop version of the game (as an HTML file) and the source code (a TXT file) for just 2$.
Some goodies will be added in the future when the game will be updated.
